mapper.insert: insert into t_contract_supplemental_agreement(ID, ProjectID, CsaCode, ManagementRate, ChangeAmount, Trice, CreateTime, CreateUser, UpdateTime, UpdateUser, Description) values ( #{ID}, #{ProjectID}, #{CsaCode}, #{ManagementRate}, #{ChangeAmount}, #{Trice}, #{CreateTime}, #{CreateUser}, #{UpdateTime}, #{UpdateUser}, #{Description} )
mapper.update: update t_contract_supplemental_agreement set ProjectID = #{ProjectID}, CsaCode = #{CsaCode}, ManagementRate = #{ManagementRate}, ChangeAmount = #{ChangeAmount}, Trice = #{Trice}, CreateTime = #{CreateTime}, CreateUser = #{CreateUser}, UpdateTime = #{UpdateTime}, UpdateUser = #{UpdateUser}, Description = #{Description} where id = #{id}
